mapper.select: select * from AttributeSimilarity_tab where (user_id1 = #{userId1} and user_id2 = #{userId2})or(user_id1 = #{userId2} and user_id2 = #{userId1})
mapper.insert: insert into AttributeSimilarity_tab(user_id1, user_id2, ageSimilarity, genderSimilarity,occupationSimilarity,attributeSim) values(#{user1}, #{user2}, #{ageSimilarity}, #{genderSimilarity}, #{occupationSimilarity}, #{attributeSim})
